title: ISic000518. I.Sicily inscription 000518
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]
ex aere conlato patrono
bene de se merito curante
et de suo quod defuerat
supplente
5Paconio Clodiano

Apparatus criticus

Text from Gualtherus; Mommsen adds interpuncts throughout, but these are not recorded by Gualtherus and so have no basis in fact.

translation

commentary

Mommsen notes the smiilarity to CIL 10.7294 = ISic000551 and so speculates that this might be a doublet in the antiquarian tradition.

bibliography

    Gualtherus 1624 no. 249 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002388 Gualtherus 1624 [1625] no. 146 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001931 Castelli 1769 cl. 5, no. 28 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002084 Castelli 1784 cl. 5, no. 29 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002083 10.7238 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
